title: 01/28/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 01/28/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Albert Breer about the chances of Aaron Rodgers and Davante Adams teaming up in Denver. Bengals Radio Color Analyst Dave Lapham calls in to discuss his unique style in calling a game. And legendary meteorologist Jim Cantore helps Seton with some weather related questions for his Cross Country trip.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
